DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: UGC-wrapper: Exploring and manipulating the form
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Exploring and manipulating the form

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the HTML element of the form's input field specified by name. If name is not given, the method returns the HTML element of the whole form.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the current value of the form's input field specified by name.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: If called without parameters, the method fills all content values into the form. If called with a name, it fills only the form field name with the assigned content value. If name and value are given, it fills the form field name with value.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Checks, if all form fields listed as arguments have a non-empty value.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Checks, if all form fields listed as arguments have an empty value.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Checks if at least one of the listed form fields is non-empty.
